column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////While the ramen was great
column2: the real highlight of JINYA was definitely the extensive list of traditional ramen toppings!  You can stick to the basics or create your own Frankenstein bowl for just a couple extra bucks.  Our only gripe was that they were skimpy with the Bok Choy - surprising since the other orders of toppings were very substantial.
